original_text: And he broke down the houses of the male cult prostitutes who were in the house of the Lord, where the women wove hangings for the Asherah.
korean_text: 또 여호와의 성전 가운데 남창의 집을 헐었으니 그 곳은 여인이 아세라를 위하여 휘장을 짜는 처소였더라

sentences.original_text: And he broke down the houses of the male cult prostitutes
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 남자 성전 매춘부들의 집들을 허물었습니다

sentences.original_text: who were in the house of the Lord
where the women wove hangings for the Asherah.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 여인들은 아세라를 위한 휘장들을 짰습니다
